name: Turnabout Cheese Tasting
description:
My submission to the UoB GDS Fall O Ween Jam 2022

A person is murdered while you and other guests attend a cheese tasting. Get to the bottom of what happened and apprehend the culprit.

Theme: "Something else and cheese"
 Something else: This game is a genre that isn't commonly made for game jams, hence it's 'something different'
 Cheese: The mystery is set surrounding a cheese tasting

*Game might chug on Chrome, unknown as to why*
*Playing game in fullscreen works, but looks slightly janky*
*Known bug(s):  Game bugs when it finisehd and resets*

Character Art: Shauné Burchell
Title Screen 3D Models : Me

Assets Used:
  3D Models: Pirate Tavern by PollyPrivateers, Wood and Stone - Easy DG by Terrac00p Studios
 
  Sound: Fantasy Towns Music Pack and Text & Dialogue SFX Pack by Chris Logsdon, Suspensful Cinematic Ambient Music by (unknown)  

  Fonts: Morris Roman, Enchanted Land, Another Typewriter
